ResistanceFeature.Name: Gift of Frost
ResistanceFeature.Text: While wearing these boots, you ignore difficult terrain while walking, and you can walk on water.

MagicProperty.Name: Shard of the Ise Rune (Boots)
MagicProperty.Description: The pair of boots is now a rare magic item that requires attunement. While wearing it, you ignore difficult terrain while walking, and you can walk on water.
